outputs.output_descr: To provide support for situating UNDP to engage and strategically maximize opportunities and challenges in the Philippines and to support for UN/UNDP corporate policies and to access funds from donors, the private sector, the government and other non-traditional sources of funds. It is also intended to support programme management and covering a range of activities within a programme life cycle that include strategic planning, project development and monitoring and evaluation through capacity development and learning of UNDP CO staff. Outputs will include project documents and proposals, strategic plans of action, capacity building and strategic interventions that support emerging and urgent issues attributing to UN/UNDP corporate policy and national priorities.

project_descr: To provide support for situating UNDP to engage and strategically maximize opportunities and challenges in the Philippines. ALsointended to support programme management covering a wide range of activities.
